original_text: And the firstborn of the poor shall feed, and the needy shall lie down in safety: and I will kill thy root with famine, and he shall slay thy remnant.
korean_text: 가난한 자의 장자는 먹겠고 궁핍한 자는 평안히 누우려니와 내가 네 뿌리를 기근으로 죽일 것이요 네게 남은 자는 살륙을 당하리라

sentences.original_text: And the firstborn of the poor shall feed
and the needy shall lie down in safety
and I will kill thy root with famine
and he shall slay thy remnant
